title: Twink

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Star Wish**: Give a player Hugproof defense for the next day, cannot target the same player twice.
- **Share Hug**: Pick a target, if no one is hugged or the hug target survives the next day, your target will be hugged instead. (1 use, only consumed if successful)
- **Action Command**: During the day, pick a Koopa Support in your team, if they are alive, they may do their action twice next night, if they are dead, they may do an action next night, can be used while dead. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Dead teammates can high-five while dead, but only once.
- All mentions of hang, execution, ejecting, etc... is replaced by hugging, votes are replaced by high-fives, this is publically announced.

desc:
